metadata.Title: CVE-2022-31253 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: A Untrusted Search Path vulnerability in openldap2 of openSUSE Factory allows local attackers with control of the ldap user or group to change ownership of arbitrary directory entries to this user/group, leading to escalation to root. This issue affects: openSUSE Factory openldap2 versions prior to 2.6.3-404.1.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> This appears to be in a SUSE-specific script

criterions.comment: openldap: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
